dict.acceptation: 戒指，指环；铃声，钟声；环形物；拳击场；
形成环状；环绕；使（例如铃）响；打电话给；

sent.orig: Objectives To summarize efficacy of redundant prepuce and phimosis using POLY-RING therapy.
sent.trans: 目的总结小儿包皮过长及包茎应用POLY-RING的治疗效果。

sent.orig: You can ring my ell, ring my bell. You can ring my bee-ell, ring my bell.
sent.trans: 你可以来找我我。你可以按我家的门铃。你可以来找我我。

sent.orig: The diamond ring is more expensive than the silver ring and the gold ring.
sent.trans: 钻石戒指比银戒指和金戒指都要贵。

sent.orig: Kits consist of: Check assembly, O-ring, Spring, Vent O-ring Bleed screw O-ring and Retainer.
sent.trans: 组件包括：止回阀总成，O形环，弹簧，排气O形环，带孔螺钉O形环和护圈。

sent.orig: A:Alright ring ring ring. I usually get this guy's answer machine, brrring.
sent.trans: 好，叮铃铃。我常常接通的是这个家伙的电话留言，叮当。
